attributes.action: add VAT to books and reading material
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This country's cultural and intellectual life is simply not going downhill fast enough. I for one believe that if we make books and newspapers more expensive then more of us will be persuaded to make our decisions based on tendentious and misleading emails, tittle-tattle and hearsay and will not have to think so hard.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
